name: OptLook
description: Optimize your site’s look for social med
overview: OptLook is a platform designed for you to optimize your website’s look on social media easily. It’s hard to keep track of how each of your website’s posts look on social media platforms and customize it without the help of a developer. OptLook, not only shows how each of your website’s posts look on social media but also allows to edit and improve them quickly. Now, you can customize your website’s look on social media and eventually the way your messages spread without any technical knowledge. With carefully planned looks, you can have up to 5 times more interaction on social media.
